Intel Special

To clear some stock we have in at the current time, we are offering a
few extras with our basic Intel p4 2.4Ghz server. You can pick from
one of the below:

DirectAdmin: We are offering DirectAdmin free for the first
month, and then $5/month after that (Or a one off setup fee of $40).

WHMCS: WHMCS is the best billing software ever created.. It
auto creates account on cPanel/DirectAdmin and many other control
panels, and even includes a support ticket system. We are offering
WHMCS free for the first month, and then $11/month after that.

DirectAdmin + WHMCS: You can pick both! The first month is just
$5, and then only $15/month after that.
